meanings.definition: Having a lot of strings or fibers
meanings.sent1: The stringiest rope was perfect for tying up the package.
meanings.sent2: The fabric with the stringiest texture felt rough against my skin.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the stringiest spaghetti must have been made by a spider.
meanings.sent4: The stringiest vines in the jungle seemed to reach out and grab us.
meanings.sent5: The stringiest yarn unraveled easily, creating a tangled mess.

meanings.definition: Strict or severe in enforcing rules or standards
meanings.sent1: The teacher was known for being the stringiest when it came to homework deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The stringiest judge in town never showed mercy in court.
meanings.sent3: The stringiest referee insisted on following every rule to the letter.
meanings.sent4: His stringiest glare made everyone in the room uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The stringiest boss expected nothing less than perfection from his employees.
